desc.p: Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.

p.p: This field contains the currency used for the purpose of grouping.
Fields CURRENCY to DEALER.DESK form a related multi value set.

desc.p: A maximum of 3 characters may be entered.
Must be the key to a valid entry on the CURRENCY file.
A maximum of 2 characters may be entered.
Must be the key to a valid entry on the DEALER.DESK file.

p.p: Dealer Desk of the currency entered in CURRENCY field.
Fields CURRENCY to DEALER.DESK form a related multi value set.

desc.p: A maximum of 2 characters may be entered.
Must be the key to a valid entry on the DEALER.DESK file
A maximum of 35 characters may be entered.
